description:
At the Tamakoma Branch, they are developing game plans based on the information that each of them gathered, but it is hard to find the decisive factor to beat Ninomiya Squad in a shoot-out. Upon hearing Chika`s decision in person, Osamu starts updating the strategy for the next match.
B-Rank Wars Round 8 that will determine their destiny is about to begin.
Source: crunchyroll
